metadata.label: Appendix 3 - CR1 Scenario
metadata.description:
Acute treatment of asthma exacerbations with inhaled bronchodilators and oral steroids.
This scenario exposes the parameters for the Oral Prednisolone intervention.
This was the mapping for the CR1 Scenario in Appendix 3 simulations.
Oral prednisolone reduces the disability weight of persons living with Asthma.
It increases the target coverage from the baseline of five percent, to the target coverage of ninety-five percent,
which was a standard coverage change for Appendix 3 simulations.
This should typically be run as a comparison scenario, with the baseline scenario being the Asthma Baseline, or this same scenario but with the target coverage having a smaller scale-up coverage.

Start Year.description: The starting year for the model simulation

End Year.description: The ending year for the model simulation

Oral Prednisolone Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Scale-Up Start Year.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Oral Prednisolone Scale-Up Final Year.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Oral Prednisolone Population In Need.description: The proportion of persons with asthma who require the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention
